channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Tyler, the Creator Unveils 2025 Camp Flog Gnaw Lineup With a Word Search
item.description: 🔍⛺️ Tyler, the Creator drops a creative clue! Who will be at Camp Flog Gnaw? Sharpen your pencils and start searching! 🌟🎶 #CampFlogGnaw2025

item.title: PC Music taps PinkPantheress, Hannah Diamond, yeule, more for Pop Crypt events
item.description: 🌟 Dive into an electric lineup at the Pop Crypt events with PC Music's finest! 💫 #PopCrypt #PCMusic #MusicNews

item.title: FKA Twigs to Replace Doechii at All Points East Festival
item.description: 🎤 Shake it up with FKA Twigs stepping in at All Points East Festival! Let's dance into this unexpected twist! 💃🕺 #FestivalVibes

item.title: Jamie Woon Announces First New Album In 10 Years 3, 10, Why, When
item.description: 🚨 Jamie Woon is back with a new album after 10 years! Get ready for some soulful goodness coming your way soon! 🎶 #JamieWoon #NewMusicAlert

item.title: The Beatles announce ‘Anthology 2025’ documentary series, box set, and book
item.description: 🎶 Get ready to dive deep into the legendary Beatles with ‘Anthology 2025’! 📽️📚 Exciting music history coming your way! 🌟 #TheBeatles #Anthology2025
